page.text: The New England Institute of Art-Brookline, MA: Bachelor of Science in
Media Arts and Animation, Degree expected Winter 2014
University of Massachusetts-Boston, MA: Bachelor of Science in Biology
Summa Cum Laude, 2005
present
Provide assistance in pre-production environment including setting up
set, lighting and cameras and, post-production with motion graphics,
animation and, video editing.

text.i: The New England Institute of Art Library

page.text: present
Provide assistance to all library related activities. Duties include
welcoming students and assisting them in charging, discharging books,
DVDs and CDs, processing of new arrivals, answering phone calls and
shelf reading.
10/2012-present
In charge of picking up and dropping off laboratory specimens to and
from various laboratories at the Boston Medical Center.
Student in the Master of Health Sciences Physician Assistant Program.
Acquired skills to treat patients and take their history.
Coordinated research studies with study participants. Duties included
filing, answering and making phone calls, interviewing patients and
insuring that the study ran smoothly.
Provided help in creating computed generated animation with Adobe
Flash for introductory Biology classes. Other duties included filming
short films and data entry.

outline.item: Provide assistance in pre-production environment including setting up set, lighting and cameras and, post-production with motion graphics, animation and, video editing.
The New England Institute of Art Library

Provide assistance to all library related activities. Duties include welcoming students and assisting them in charging, discharging books, DVDs and CDs, processing of new arrivals, answering phone calls and shelf reading.
In charge of picking up and dropping off laboratory specimens to and from various laboratories at the Boston Medical Center.
Student in the Master of Health Sciences Physician Assistant Program. Acquired skills to treat patients and take their history.
Coordinated research studies with study participants. Duties included filing, answering and making phone calls, interviewing patients and insuring that the study ran smoothly.
Provided help in creating computed generated animation with Adobe Flash for introductory Biology classes. Other duties included filming short films and data entry.
